verbs.description: [ARG1: BEIJING , June 19- China and the United States] [V: sank] [ARG4: into a deepening trade conflict that roiled financial markets Tuesday after U.S. The sheer size of Trump 's latest threat makes it impossible for an in - kind response from China since the value of the goods involved exceeds by $ 70 billion the total value of U.S. imports to China last year , U.S. data shows] .

BEIJING , June 19- China and the United States sank into a [V: deepening] [ARG1: trade conflict] that roiled financial markets Tuesday after U.S. The sheer size of Trump 's latest threat makes it impossible for an in - kind response from China since the value of the goods involved exceeds by $ 70 billion the total value of U.S. imports to China last year , U.S. data shows .
